wordpressPage.title: Cereal Box Game
wordpressPage.content:
This is a classic but still a great game!

Equipment: A cereal box and some scissors.

The Game: Get your young people to stand in a big circle around the cereal box.

One young person at a time tries to pick up the cereal box using their mouth. Their feet are the only part of their body allowed to touch the floor.

If a young person manages they stay in, if they don’t they’re out.

Once the whole group have been cut a few centimetres off the cereal box to make it shorter and repeat the process.

Keep going until only one young person remains in
